a.n: The Stepmother 8: Staci Silverstone & James Deen

p.k: Billy and Julia are getting close to marriage, but each have a single parent who?s loneliness is ruining their peace. But the real problem arises when Billy can?t stop thinking about Julia?s gorgeous mother, Theresa. Will Theresa settle for quiet companionship, or will she succumb to lust for the vibrant young man. A Sweet Sinner?s daring look into forbidden passion.
